subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Doclet
msgSnippet: ... That sounds like an interesting idea.  Will the test case javadoc comments end up in the documentation generated by javadoc? Joshua Levy
messageBody:
--- jbirchfield@... wrote:
> So I have put together the frame work for
> automatically
> generating test cases for any class, any method.

That sounds like an interesting idea. Will the
"test case" javadoc comments end up in the documentation
generated by javadoc?

Joshua Levy
